column7: A mixed-voice chorus open to students from all majors and disciplines on campus. Explores through study and performance a wide variety of choral music from various cultures, styles, and time periods. Completion of course involves, in addition to the regular schedule of rehearsals, participation in public performances by the ensemble. 1 undergraduate hour. 1 graduate hour. May be repeated in separate terms. Prerequisite: Audition required and/or consent of instructor.
